dct_title_s: Boundary between the United States & Mexico
dct_alternative_sm: Boundary between the United States & Mexico Shewing the initial point. under the Treaty of December 30th 1853 / projected & drawn by F. Herbst.
dct_description_sm: "Astronomically determined and surveyed in 1855. under the direction of William H. Emory, U.S. Commissioner."
"Latitude and Longitude by W. H. Emory, assisted by J. H. Clark."
"Trangulation and Topography by M. von Hippel, assisted by J. E. Weyss."
Includes "View along the boundary line-looking E. from monument No. 3" and "View of the initial point of the boundary line on the Rio Bravo Del Norte-looking W" Ino. Weyess del., W. H. Douglas.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
